name: Project Lockdown (Working Title)
description:
Project Lockdown is a 2D platformer where you need to use grappling points to sling through levels before the time is up.

In the game's current state it features: 10 levels, 4 unique obstacles and 4 movement options. More of each will be added in the future as feedback is taken into account and development moves forward. Additionally, there are plans for visual updates, differing environments, new music, and more options for settings and customization.

This build is made primarily for feedback so send how you feel about the game so far to my Twitter. Feedback can be just a general review, telling me about bugs you might've found, tips on improving how controlling the character feels or new level/mechanic ideas.

If you want to continue following the development as this project continues and see the improvements/new features that are added past this build, follow me on Twitter where I'll be posting whatever I make next.
